name: 48 Leagues Under the Sea
description:
Made during the LudumDare 48 game jam with Bobby Khaleque and Guilherme Matos de Faria. We are IGGI PhD students with the University of York and Queen Mary University London. 

48 Leagues under the sea plays a little like Binding of Isaac but features limited vision. 

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around, and mouse to aim. Left click to fire a Harpoon.

You can't find the exit to a room when there are sharks in the room. Once they are defeated you can move to another room.
